"INFS1609 can be daunting for students with little coding experience - we get it, we've been there. In fact, that's why we made this app! Ace this course with the following tools..." "DID YOU KNOW: active recall is one of the practices through which our brains learn most effectively - So create your own and get revising!"
"Writing your own notes is always great for memory retention, but in case you're short on time, we've provided some of our own" "Feeling confident? Not sure what you don't know? Test your knowledge by attempting past exam questions in multiple formats" "Reading can be tiring - why not mix it up with some visual learning? We've prepared a playlist of our favourite object-oriented programming videos that will help you learn effortlessly"
